body:
A fan-fiction about Avicus, hopefully it turns out O.K. ^-^
I'll add more info later, but for now:
Contents:
 https://docs.google.com/document/d/16zIgZifzghqam9IB0uqAy5ChPAT7HYSxz2ENlaAGx6U/edit
Chapter I:Betrayal
Chapter II:Fluenza
Credit: Minecraft_Zach for his fanfiction, http://avicus.net/forums/4f03ba857
Enjoy! ^-^
(Sorry for any errors, didn't have much time :P)
Feedback below!
If you want to be in the story, comment below, along with a description, and I might add you ^-^
P.S Can you guys guess who the shadows and the figures mentioned in the story are? ^-^
Comment below!
Added "Interaction and Discussion" to the story, commentate or answer on these questions:
Who is:
The lord that wants to destroy Avicus?
The General who will betray his lord?
The Right-hand man who has betrayed his Emperor?
Ch2:
Who is the right shadow?
The left?
Why is the name of the chapter Fluenza?
Commentate on this thread, or on the google doc!

replies.body:
@all Thanks for the support guys! ^-^
And if you're one of the guys who requested to be in my story... I'll consider it! ^-^ Most of you will probably appear later on! ^-^

Updated Chapters 1 & 2, proofread.
Chapter 3 will probably come out in 2-3 days, it's planned to be a lengthy chapter, unlike the first two ^-^
Enjoy!
